Apache directory studio trouble shoot

If your apache directory studio can not find jre or jdk. It will exit with error 13.

So you have to download a jre or jdk, and tell ads where is it.

For example, if we download it and put it under C:\DATA\Mes Documents\Tools\jdk1.8.0_131\

go to C:\DATA\Mes Documents\Tools\ApacheDirectoryStudio

edit the file ApacheDirectoryStudio.ini

the config file should looks like this 

-vm

C:\DATA\Mes Documents\Tools\jdk1.8.0_131\jre\bin

-startup

plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.3.0.v20140415-2008.jar

--launcher.library

plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.win32.win32.x86_64_1.1.200.v20150204-1316

/studio-rcp/resources/icons/linux/studio.xpm

-vmargs

-Dosgi.requiredJavaVersion=1.7
